EmailTemplate.subject: New survey reveals new directions for virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Build innovative, high-value benefits strategies that meet modern trends In our new Virtual Care Transformation study, we learned that organizations are realizing the value of virtual care for its ability to address challenging market trends. In addition to leaning into virtual-first strategies, our survey of hundreds of U.S.-based employers revealed several other exciting insights about the future of virtual care, including: - Employers are accelerating a whole-person approach to care - Employers plan to expand their virtual mental health and chronic care services - Equitably meeting the health needs of diverse populations is a top priority Get all the details from the study and see the final 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index presented at our SHRM webinar, once again featuring Kelly Bliss, U.S. Group Health President at Teladoc Health. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
